WorkItem.ClosedComment: Issue now fixed in develop branch
WorkItem.Description:
When attempting to run the pie chart example (Examples/33chartcreate-pie.php) the .xlsx file is generated but opening it gives the following error:

We found a problem with some content in '33chartcreate-pie.xlsx'. Do you want us to try to recover as much as we can? If you trust the source of this workbook, click Yes.

Clicking "Yes" allows you to open the workbook, but no chart appears (although the data used in the chart is there).

I've gotten this error with the following PHP Versions:

PHP 5.4.19 on ubuntu 64 bit
PHP 5.5.3 on ubuntu 64 bit

I've tried the following office versions:

Office 2010
Office 2013
WorkItem.Summary: Pie Chart example does not work

Comments.Message:
I have the same problem using the Examples/33chartcreate-pie.php to generate an Excel 2013 spreadsheet with a pie chart.  It works fine using Excel 2010 for me.

I get the same error message as stated above.  Is there an issue with creating Pie Charts in Excel 2013 as other charts seem to work fine?  Please advise and provide sample code that works for Excel 2013.  Thanks!
